comment: Liz Warren is a classic example of a woman who is book smart but not people smart. A redneck could have told her it was a bad idea to publicize the results from that DNA test. She just doesn't get it. And it's why she will never be president.
amr:
# ::snt Liz Warren is a classic example of a woman who is book smart but not people smart. A redneck could have told her it was a bad idea to publicize the results from that DNA test. She just doesn't get it. And it's why she will never be president.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / exemplify-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Liz"
                        :op2 "Warren"))
            :ARG1 (w / woman
                  :ARG1-of (s / smart-06
                        :mod (b / book)
                        :ARG1-of (c / contrast-01
                              :ARG2 (s2 / smart-06
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / person)))))
            :mod (c2 / classic))
      :snt2 (p3 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (t / tell-01
                  :ARG0 (r / redneck)
                  :ARG1 (ii / idea
                        :ARG1-of (b2 / bad-07)
                        :domain (p4 / publicize-01
                              :ARG1 (r2 / result-01
                                    :ARG2 (t2 / test-01
                                          :ARG1 (n2 / nucleic-acid
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "DNA"))
                                          :mod (t3 / that)))))
                  :ARG2 (s3 / she)))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op2 (g / get-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (s4 / she)
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
                  :mod (j / just))
            :op3 (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (h / have-org-role-91
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 s4
                        :ARG2 (p5 / president)
                        :time (e2 / ever)))))

comment: She certainly cannot run vs Trump - he would make mincemeat of her.
